item.title: Create a custom graphics theme
item.description: Customizing ggplots by hand works fine, but can be tideous if you’re doing it over and over again during a project (which I have). Therefore, creating a custom ggplot theme that includes adaptations of style and colour and that can be stored and loaded on demand has been on my to do list for a long time. This seems like a good place to start a blog… So here it comes.
